quote: There are no original ideas. There are only original people
author: Barbara Grizzuti

quote: The person who gets 1 shot needs everything to go right, the person who gets 1000 shots is going to score at some point. Find a way to play the game that ensures you get a lot of shots
author: James Clear

quote: Success isn't overnight. It's when everyday you get a little better than the day before. It all adds up
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times
author: Bruce Lee

quote: We're externally reliant on conditions being perfect in order to be able to go out and have a good time
author: Josh Waitzkin

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement, nothing can be done without hope
author: Helen Keller

quote: No one is as impressed with your possessions as you are
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Don't ever work for someone you don't want to become
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Cultivate 12 people who love you, because they are worth more than 12 million people who like you
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Don't keep making the same mistakes; try to make new mistakes
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: If you stop to listen to a musician or street performer for more than a minute, you owe them a dollar
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Anything you say before the word 'but' does not count
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Forgiveness primarily benefits your own healing, acting as a personal gift
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Practice simple, free courtesies in daily life, like tidiness and respect in shared spaces, and return borrowed items in better condition
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Whenever there is an argument between two sides, find the third side
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Rest and leisure are crucial for peak performance and a strong work ethic; don't overvalue constant efficiency at the expense of necessary breaks
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: When you lead, your real job is to create more leaders, not more followers
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Criticize in private, praise in public
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Life presents lessons sequentially as needed, and you possess the inherent ability to master them; being alive implies continuous learning
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: It is the duty of a student to get everything out of a teacher, and the duty of a teacher to get everything out of a student
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: If winning becomes too important in a game, change the rules to make it more fun. Changing rules can become the new game
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Ask funders for money, and they'll give you advice; but ask for advice and they'll give you money
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Focus on finding engaging and meaningful tasks rather than just optimizing for speed in completing all tasks; true productivity can be a distraction from fulfilling work
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Promptly pay vendors, workers, and contractors to build goodwill and ensure they prioritize working with you in the future
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: The biggest lie we tell ourselves is 'I don't need to write this down because I will remember it.
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Your growth as a conscious being is measured by the number of uncomfortable conversations you are willing to have
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Speak confidently as if you are right, but listen carefully as if you are wrong
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Handy measure: the distance between your fingertips of your outstretched arms at shoulder level is your height
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Consistent daily effort in areas like exercise, relationships, and work yields better results than infrequent, large efforts
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Making art is not selfish; it's for the rest of us. If you don't do your thing, you are cheating us
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Never ask a woman if she is pregnant. Let her tell you if she is
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Essential needs include persistence for viable projects, decisiveness to abandon failing ones, and trusting others to help differentiate
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Use pauses effectively in public speaking—before new points, after important statements, and to allow audience absorption—to enhance communication
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: There is no such thing as being 'on time.' You are either late or you are early. Your choice
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Admired individuals often find lucky breaks through unexpected detours from their primary goals, so embrace life's non-linear path
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: The best way to get a correct answer on the internet is to post an obviously wrong answer and wait for someone to correct you
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Reinforcing good behavior is far more effective than punishing bad behavior, particularly with children and animals
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Invest significant effort in email subject lines, as they are frequently the only part recipients read and determine if the email is opened
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Don't wait for the storm to pass; dance in the rain
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: To get honest feedback when checking job references, ask referees to respond only if they *highly* recommend the candidate; a non-response can indicate a negative assessment
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Use a password manager: Safer, easier, better
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Half the skill of being educated is learning what you can ignore
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Setting extremely ambitious goals means that even falling short can result in achievements considered successful by normal standards
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: A great way to understand yourself is to seriously reflect on everything you find irritating in others
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: To avoid leaving items in a hotel, keep everything visible and grouped together. For outliers like chargers, place them with other large items to make them harder to forget
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Denying or deflecting a compliment is rude. Accept it with thanks, even if you believe it is not deserved
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Always read the plaque next to the monument
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Imposter syndrome is common with success, but creating things that stem from your unique abilities confirms your authenticity; focus on these unique contributions
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: What you do on your bad days matters more than what you do on your good days
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Make stuff that is good for people to have
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: When you open paint, even a tiny bit, it will always find its way to your clothes no matter how careful you are. Dress accordingly
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Manage children's behavior on road trips by discarding a piece of their favorite candy out the window for each misbehavior
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: You cannot get smart people to work extremely hard just for money
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: When you don't know how much to pay someone for a particular task, ask them 'what would be fair' and their answer usually is
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Since most things in any category might not appeal to you (are 'crap'), persist in exploring to discover the 10% that you find valuable or enjoyable
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger, more complex, and more violent. It takes a touch of genius—and a lot of courage—to move in the opposite direction.
author: E.F. Schumacher

quote: It’s only when you begin to learn a few things really well do you appreciate how much there is to know.
author: The Feynman Technique

quote: If you can’t reduce a difficult engineering problem to just one 8-1/2 x 11-inch sheet of paper, you will probably never understand it.
author: Ralph Peck

quote: If you don't know where you are going, any road will get you there
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: We crave control in life long before we are in a position to understand why things happen
author: David Amerland

quote: You can never undestand what you cannot record. You can never improve what you cannot measure. And you can never control what you cannot analyze
author: David Amerland

quote: Believes are explanations. Values are priorities. Actions are a reflection of who we truly are
author: David Amerland

quote: It is in the consistency of our actions that we manifest not just who we are but also who we want to become
author: David Amerland

quote: Without emotion no action is sustaniable
author: David Amerland

quote: In programming a lot of it is figuring out what part of the code you can change and what should always be the same
author: Unknown

quote: the best way to get what you want is to deserve it
author: Josh Swords
